suggestions.title: Choose Plant-Based Options
suggestions.description: Consider reducing meat consumption by incorporating more plant-based meals into your diet.

suggestions.title: Buy Local and Seasonal
suggestions.description: Choose locally grown fruits and vegetables that are in season to reduce transportation emissions.

suggestions.title: Reduce Dairy Consumption
suggestions.description: Try plant-based milk alternatives like soy, almond, or oat milk to reduce dairy emissions.

suggestions.title: Buy in Bulk
suggestions.description: Purchase grains and dry goods in bulk to reduce packaging waste and emissions.

suggestions.title: Choose Eco-Friendly Transportation
suggestions.description: Consider using public transport, carpooling, or cycling for shorter trips.

suggestions.title: Maintain Your Vehicle
suggestions.description: Regular maintenance and proper tire pressure can improve fuel efficiency.
